member.name: T:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.McTask
member.summary: Compiles messages using mc.exe, Microsoft's Win32 message compiler.

example.para: Compile text.mc using the default options.
Compile text.mc, passing a path to store the header, the rc file and some additonal options.

member.summary: Compiles the sources.

member.summary: Determine if source files need re-building.

member.summary: Options to pass to the compiler.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.McTask.HeaderPath
member.summary: Path to store header file. The default is the project base directory.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.McTask.RCPath
member.summary: Path to store RC file. The default is the project base directory.

member.summary: Input filename.

member.summary: Gets the filename of the external program to start.
member.value: The filename of the external program.

member.summary: Gets the command-line arguments for the external program.
member.value: The command-line arguments for the external program.

member.name: T:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask
member.summary: This tasks allows you to run MIDL.exe.

remarks.para: This task only supports a small subset of the MIDL.EXE command line switches, but you can use the options element to specify any other unsupported commands you want to specify.

example.code: <midl env="win32" Oi="cf" tlb="${outputdir}\TempAtl.tlb" header="${outputdir}\TempAtl.h" iid="${outputdir}\TempAtl_i.c" proxy="${outputdir}\TempAtl_p.c" filename="TempAtl.idl" > <defines> <define name="_DEBUG"/> <define name="WIN32" value="1"/> </defines> <options> <option name="/mktyplib203"/> <option name="/error" value="allocation"/> </options> </midl>

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: This is where the work is done.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.NeedsCompiling(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Check output files to see if we need rebuilding.
member.returns: if a rebuild is needed; otherwise, .

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.WriteResponseFile(System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Writes the response file for midl.exe.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Acf
member.summary: The /acf switch allows the user to supply an explicit ACF file name. The switch also allows the use of different interface names in the IDL and ACF files.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Align
member.summary: The /align switch is functionally the same as the MIDL /Zp option and is recognized by the MIDL compiler solely for backward compatibility with MkTypLib.
member.remarks: The alignment value can be 1, 2, 4, or 8.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.AppConfig
member.summary: The /app_config switch selects application-configuration mode, which allows you to use some ACF keywords in the IDL file. With this MIDL compiler switch, you can omit the ACF and specify an interface in a single IDL file.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Char
member.summary: The /char switch helps to ensure that the MIDL compiler and C compiler operate together correctly for all char and small types.
member.remarks: Can be one of signed | unsigned | ascii7

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Client
member.summary: The /client switch directs the MIDL compiler to generate client-side C source files for an RPC interface
member.remarks: can be one of stub | none

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.CStub
member.summary: The /cstub switch specifies the name of the client stub file for an RPC interface.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.DllData
member.summary: Specifies the file name for the generated dlldata file for a proxy DLL. The default file name Dlldata.c is used if is not specified.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Env
member.summary: The /env switch selects the environment in which the application runs.
member.remarks: It can take the values win32 and win64

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Oi
member.summary: The /Oi switch directs the MIDL compiler to use a fully-interpreted marshaling method. The /Oic and /Oicf switches provide additional performance enhancements.
member.remarks: If you specify the Oi attribute, you must set it to one of the values: - Oi="" - Oi="c" - Oi="f" - Oi="cf"

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Tlb
member.summary: Specifies a file name for the type library generated by the MIDL compiler.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Header
member.summary: Specifies the name of the header file.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Iid
member.summary: Specifies the name of the interface identifier file for a COM interface, overriding the default name obtained by adding _i.c to the IDL file name.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Proxy
member.summary: Specifies the name of the interface proxy file for a COM interface.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Filename
member.summary: Name of .IDL file to process.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Options
member.summary: Additional options to pass to midl.exe.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Defines
member.summary: Macro definitions to pass to mdil.exe. Each entry will generate a /D

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.Undefines
member.summary: Macro undefines (/U) to pass to mdil.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.IncludeDirs
member.summary: The list of directories in which to search for include files.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.ProgramFileName
member.summary: Filename of program to execute

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.MidlTask.ProgramArguments
member.summary: Gets the command-line arguments for the external program.
member.value: The command-line arguments for the external program.

member.name: T:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask
member.summary: Links files using link.exe, Microsoft's Incremental Linker.

remarks.para: This task is intended for version 7.00.9466 of link.exe.

example.para: Combine all object files in the current directory into helloworld.exe.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.NeedsLinking
member.summary: Determines if the output needs linking.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Links the sources.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.QuoteArgumentValue(System.String)
member.summary: Quotes an argument value and duplicates trailing backslahes.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.Options
member.summary: Options to pass to the compiler.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.Debug
member.summary: Create debugging information for the .exe file or DLL. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.OutputFile
member.summary: The output file.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.ProgramDatabaseFile
member.summary: A user-specified name for the program database (PDB) that the linker creates. The default file name for the PDB has the base name of the and the extension .pdb.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.Sources
member.summary: The list of files to combine into the output file.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.LibDirs
member.summary: The list of additional library directories to search.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.Modules
member.summary: Link the specified modules into this assembly.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.EmbeddedResources
member.summary: Embed the specified resources into this assembly.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.LinkTask.ProgramFileName
member.summary: Gets the filename of the external program to start.
member.value: The filename of the external program.

member.summary: Gets the command-line arguments for the external program.
member.value: The command-line arguments for the external program.

member.name: T:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask
member.summary: Compiles C/C++ programs using cl.exe, Microsoft's C/C++ compiler.

remarks.para: This task is intended for version 13.00.9466 of cl.exe.

example.para: Compiles helloworld.cpp for the Common Language Runtime.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.IsPchfileUpToDate
member.summary: Determines whether the precompiled header file is up-to-date.
member.returns: if no precompiled header file was specified; otherwise, .
member.remarks: In order to determine accurately whether the precompile header file is up-to-date, we'd need scan all the header files that are pulled in. As this is not implemented right now, its safer to always recompile.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.NeedsCompiling
member.summary: Determines if the sources need compiling.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.ExecuteTask
member.summary: Compiles the sources.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.QuoteArgumentValue(System.String)
member.summary: Quotes an argument value and duplicates trailing backslahes.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.OutputDir
member.summary: Directory where all output files are placed.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.PchFile
member.summary: Specifies the path and/or name of the generated precompiled header file - given either relative to or as an absolute path.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.PchThroughFile
member.summary: The path of the boundary file when generating/using the specified . If a precompiled header file is not specified then this attribute is ignored.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.PchMode
member.summary: The mode in which the specified (if any) is used. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.ManagedExtensions
member.summary: Specifies whether Managed Extensions for C++ should be enabled. The default is .

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.CharacterSet
member.summary: Tells the compiler to use the specified character set.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.Options
member.summary: Options to pass to the compiler.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.Sources
member.summary: The list of files to compile.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.IncludeDirs
member.summary: The list of directories in which to search for include files.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.MetaDataIncludeDirs
member.summary: Directories that the compiler will search to resolve file references passed to the #using directive.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.ForcedUsingFiles
member.summary: Specifies metadata files to reference in this compilation as an alternative to passing a file name to #using in source code.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.Defines
member.summary: Macro definitions to pass to cl.exe. Each entry will generate a /D

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.Undefines
member.summary: Macro undefines (/U) to pass to cl.exe.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.ObjectFile
member.summary: A name to override the default object file name; can be either a file or directory name. The default is the output directory.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.ProgramDatabaseFile
member.summary: A name for the compiler-generated PDB file; can be either a file or directory name. The default is the output directory.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.ProgramFileName
member.summary: Gets the filename of the external program to start.
member.value: The filename of the external program.

member.name: P:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.ProgramArguments
member.summary: Gets the command-line arguments for the external program.
member.value: The command-line arguments for the external program.

member.name: T:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.PrecompiledHeaderMode
member.summary: Defines the supported modes for the use of precompiled header files.

member.name: F:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.PrecompiledHeaderMode.Create
member.summary: Create a precompiled header file.
member.remarks: For further information on the use of this option see the Microsoft documentation on the C++ compiler flag /Yc.

member.name: F:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.PrecompiledHeaderMode.AutoCreate
member.summary: Automatically create a precompiled header file if necessary.
member.remarks: For further information on the use of this option see the Microsoft documentation on the C++ compiler flag /YX.

member.name: F:NAnt.VisualCpp.Tasks.ClTask.PrecompiledHeaderMode.Use
member.summary: Use a (previously generated) precompiled header file.
member.remarks: For further information on the use of this option see the Microsoft documentation on the C++ compiler flag /Yu.

member.name: T:NAnt.VisualCpp.Util.ArgumentUtils
member.summary: Groups a set of useful manipulation methods for command-line arguments.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Util.ArgumentUtils.DuplicateTrailingBackSlash(System.String)
member.summary: Duplicates the trailing backslash.
member.param: The input string to check and duplicate the trailing backslash if necessary.
member.returns: The result string after being processed.
member.remarks: Also duplicates trailing backslash in quoted value.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Util.ArgumentUtils.FixTrailingBackSlash(System.String)
member.summary: Fixes the trailing backslash. This function replaces the trailing double backslashes with only one backslash. It also, removes the single trailing backslash.
member.returns: The result string after being processed.

member.name: M:NAnt.VisualCpp.Util.ArgumentUtils.CleanTrailingBackSlash(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all the trailing backslashes from the input.
member.returns: The result string without trailing backslashes.
